body.p: The following list describes the setup that is tested and recommended. Several items, e.g. the servlet container, may be replaced by other products.

ul.li:
Java 2 Platform, Standard Edition (recommended: J2SE 1.4.2 Beta)
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/download.html

Apache Tomcat for JDK 1.4 (recommended: 4.1.24)
Tomcat release builds
Pick one of the jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-LE-jdk14 files!

Apache Ant (recommended: 1.5.3)
Ant main distribution directory

Apache Cocoon (recommended: Cocoon 2.1 M1 for the CVS version of Lenya)
Cocoon download page
